description:
Make Learning Fun with Rody-Chick-Fun! Transform screen time into brain time! Rody-Chick-Fun is the perfect educational app designed to help children aged 4-10 develop essential cognitive skills through fun, engaging gameplay. WHY KIDS LOVE IT

Beautiful, colorful animations that capture attention
Instant feedback with celebration effects
No reading required - perfect for young learners
Achievable challenges that build confidence
Reward system with unlockable achievements
FOUR AMAZING GAMES Memory Cards
Find matching pairs in this classic memory game! 16 adorable emoji cards with smooth 3D flip animations help develop visual memory and concentration. Perfect for building focus and pattern recognition skills.Pattern Match
Watch, remember, and repeat! This Simon Says-style game challenges kids to memorize increasingly complex color sequences. Develops short-term memory, attention span, and sequential thinking. Color Match
Race against time to match colors! Fast-paced gameplay helps improve quick thinking, color recognition, and decision-making skills. Kids learn to process information quickly while having a blast. Shape Match
Find matching shapes and colors in this progressive puzzle game! Multiple difficulty levels adapt as your child improves, teaching logical thinking and problem-solving.
 TRACK PROGRESS
Individual best scores for each game
Total score tracking
6 unlockable achievement badges
Beautiful statistics charts
Celebrate every milestone!
 PARENT-APPROVED FEATURES
 100% Safe - No ads, no in-app purchases
 Privacy First - No data collection, completely offline
Age Appropriate - Designed specifically for ages 4-10
 Educational - Based on cognitive development principles
Screen Time Well Spent - Learning disguised as play
COPPA Compliant - Meets all child safety standards EDUCATIONAL BENEFITSCognitive Development:
Enhances short and long-term memory
Improves concentration and focus
Develops pattern recognition
Strengthens problem-solving abilities
Boosts processing speed

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

Al Quran - القران الكريم app is an authentic Islamic application that complements the traditional printed Qur'an, providing a variety of features for Listening & Reading Holy Quran for iPhone and iPad users.
تطبيق Al Quran - القران الكريم هو تطبيق إسلامي أصيل يكمّل القرآن المطبوع التقليدي، حيث يوفر مجموعة من الميزات للاستماع وقراءة القران الكريم لمستخدمي آيفون وآيباد.

The Qur'an, revered as the Holy Book of Islam, stands as the ultimate source of guidance and wisdom for all of humanity. In the divine revelation, the Angel Jibril (AS) conveyed Allah's profound words to the revered Prophet Muhammad (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) over the course of 23 years, shaping the sacred scripture into its transcendent form.

القرآن، الذي يعتبر كتاب الله المقدس في الإسلام، يقف كمصدر نهائي للهداية والحكمة لكل البشر. في الوحي الإلهي، قام الملك جبريل (عليه السلام) بنقل كلمات الله العميقة إلى النبي المحترم محمد (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) على مدى ٢٣ عامًا، صاغًا بذلك كتاب المقدس في شكله السامي.

Al Quran - القران الكريم is a beautiful and inspiring Holy Book, and it is said that the recitation of the Qur'an is one of the most rewarding acts of worship. 
The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) said, The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it." (Sahih Bukhari, Hadith number 5029)
 
القران - القران الكريم هو كتاب مقدس جميل وملهم، ويقال أن تلاوة القران من أكثر العبادات مكافأة. 
قال النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم: «خيركم من تعلم القران وعلمه» - (صحيح البخاري، الحديث رقم ٥٠٢٩)
Features:

Experience seamless reading with our app's resume feature for Quran قران readers and reciters. Enjoy crystal-clear HD quality with a 16 line display mirroring the precision of a paper Quran. Unlike traditional paper versions, our app's Arabic Word Zoom feature allows users to read with enhanced accuracy and the ability to zoom in. Our efficient search function, combined with the Go To Page feature, enables users to navigate directly to any Qur'an page, enhancing the overall user experience.

Our Quran Majeed  القران المجيد app also provides the Hijri date, with an available option for hijri date adjustment. You can manually adjust the Hijri date according to your preferences.

Discover our Global Prayer Times Clock, equipped with Azan / Adhan alarms featuring short and long adhan sounds. With support for diverse prayer time calculation methods, the app automatically detects your current location and calculates prayer timings for you. Customize manually as needed.

To cater to the diverse needs of Muslim residing in various countries, our Al Quran - القران الكريم is fully available in local languages such as English, Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, Urdu, Persian, Turkish, Malay, Malayalam, French, Russian, Uzbek, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, German, Thai, and Bengali. This broad language support is designed to enhance the experience for Muslims across the globe.

Indulge in the melodic recitations of 20+ renowned Quran reciters on Al Quran - القران الكريم app. Seamlessly stream or save audio for offline listening, featuring distinguished voices from World famous reciters

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.


Policy link: https://sites.google.com/view/pp-holy-quran/home  
EULA link: https://sites.google.com/view/eula-holy-quran/home

Enjoy storytelling that speaks to you with Audible. Discover a collection of audiobooks, podcasts and exclusive Originals for endless listening. Stay up to date on discounted membership plans and enjoy audio entertainment of all genres today with Audible.

Focus on health and wellness by diving into self help podcasts, fitness or meditation audiobooks. Follow the latest episode of a true crime podcast or binge a bestselling audiobook series. Explore an exciting library with thousands of titles including Harry Potter, The Midnight Seller, A Promised Land and Sherlock Holmes.

Relax to calming sounds or fall into a deep slumber with sleep stories. Stream audiobooks with CarPlay on your morning commute or listen to bestsellers on your Apple Watch while on a run — tackle your to-read list with Audible. Enjoy mental health podcasts or and listen seamlessly across different devices, with or without WiFi.

Find intriguing stories that speak to you and build your library with audiobooks to keep forever. Tap into the best of audio entertainment, today.

Start listening now!

AUDIBLE FEATURES

AUDIO ENTERTAINMENT FOR EVERYONE
Listen to thousands of audiobooks and podcasts. Build a library with a wide range of genres, like:
• Science fiction
• Crime and thriller
• Mindfulness and meditation
• Sleep stories
• Kids’ books
• Biographies
• Health and wellness
• Personal development
• Nonfiction, and more

UNPLUG & FEAST YOUR EARS
Listen to storytelling that enriches you with immersive audio experiences for every moment.
• Mindful meditation, relaxing sounds or sleep stories - relax with audio fit for every mood
• Let audiobooks and podcasts captivate you throughout your day
• Enjoy true crime stories during your commute or sci-fi books on a lazy Sunday

STORIES ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Queue up downloads, adjust your listening speed and experience seamless listening with Audible.
• Offline listening - stream or download directly to enjoy Audible with or without WiFi
• CarPlay allows you to easily connect your phone to your car for continued listening
• WhisperSync - seamlessly switch between reading on your Kindle and listening on Audible
• Sleep Timer - set a timer to automatically pause your audiobook

KIDS PROFILE
Create a Kids Profile for your child and share family-friendly listens from our extensive catalog of children’s audiobooks, podcasts and Originals, right from the app.

AUDIBLE MEMBERSHIP
Get the most from your subscription with discounts on our monthly plan. Try cash purchases for titles you love and benefit from discounted prices as an Audible member.

As an Audible member, enjoy unlimited listening for a single price:
• 1 credit per month to pick any title that you want to keep forever
• The Plus Catalogue - unlimited listening for thousands of Originals, podcasts & audiobooks
• Receive exclusive member only deals and get up to 80% off selected titles
• Permanent audio library - titles purchased with credits are yours to keep, even if you cancel


Need more? Purchase individual credits through the app and make the most of your Audible membership.

Experience a new form of health and wellness. Listen to storytelling that speaks to you, anytime, anywhere with Audible, an Amazon company.

-

If you subscribe to Audible via iTunes where available, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current membership period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each membership period at the rate of your selected plan. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

• Litres: Books - a huge library in Estonian, English, Lithuanian, Latvian, Russian and other languages. 
• All the latest international bestsellers 
• The #1 reading app in the App Store 
• Over 10 million of happy customers
• The largest catalog — over 250,000 books 
Welcome to Litres! It’s a great way to read your favorite books on your iPhone or iPad.

 
For you:

· Access to 600,000 books and audiobooks in your favorite genres: fantasy, science fiction, business, Russian literature, DIY, romance, mystery, action, business, self-improvement, psychology, and much more.
· The first 20% of any book is free. What if you don’t like it? Read and choose which books to get.
· The hottest new releases. Be the first! Most new releases appear in the Litres catalog at the same time the paper book is released.
· Over 32,000 free books — read to your heart's content!
· Enter regularly-scheduled drawings and win valuable prizes for registered Litres users.
 
Special features:

· Your books are always with you — all the books you have purchased are available to you on all your devices (as long as you use the same account)
· Start reading on your iPhone, pick up where you left off on your iPad! All your bookmarks will be synced across all your devices and the Litres online reader (as long as you use the same account)
· The convenient search function lets you search for books based on various criteria. Do you only know the author's last name? Or are you trying to find a new fantasy novel to read? Our search function can help!
· You can sign up in a single tap using your social network account
 
To select a book:

· Read large free excerpts before you buy the book (up to 20% of the book)
· Read book reviews by other users or write your own
· Study the author's official web page with biographies, critiques, and easy access to series of books
 
While reading, you can:

· add the pages you need to your bookmarks
· see how many pages you’ve read and how many you have left
· fine-tune your reading experience for maximum comfort — adjust book background, screen brightness, and font size
· access your entire library in offline mode even when roaming or outside a network area (you will have to download the books beforehand)
· enable nighttime reading mode with a single button
  
If you like a book, you can:

· buy it with a single tap or put it in your cart and buy it later from your current device or a different one
· share information about the book with your friends on a social network
 
Get access to the best books and read online. Enjoy authors such as:

Boris Akunin, E. L. James, Alexandra Marinina, Sergei Lukyanenko, Darya Dontsova, Dina Rubina, Tatyana Ustinova, Roman Zlotnikov, Jojo Moyes, Tatyana Polyakova, George R. R. Martin, Vadim Panov, Sergei Tarmashev, Dmitrii Glukhovsky, Elena Zvyozdnaya, Stephen King, Max Frye, Maria Metlitskaya, Oleg Roi, Andrei Kruz, Yekaterina Vilmont, Donna Tartt, Zakhar Prilepin, Artyom Kamenisty, Dan Brown, Viktor Pelevin, James Rollins, Robert Galbraith, Vadim Zeland, Dmitrii Bykov, Alexander Mazin, Erich Maria Remarque, Anna and Sergei Litvinov, Natalya Zhiltsova, Dmitrii Rus, Jo Nesbø, Anna Gavrilova, Irene Kao, Viktoria Tokareva, Alexander Pushkin, Anton Chekhov, Fyodor Dostoevsky, Leo Tolstoy, Ivan Turgenev. Most popular books - Anna Karenina, War and Peace, Crime and Punishment, The Brothers Karamazov, Fathers and Sons.
 
Note: the Litres app may collect anonymous usage statistics.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/terms-of-use

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

أفضل تطبيق لختم القرآن في المدة التي تريدها، بالإضافة إلى مواقيت الصلاة والأذكار والقبلة - أكثر من 18 مليون مستخدم.
Khatmah App is your daily Quran reader providing you with Prayer Times, Mushaf, Athkar, and Qibla - used by over 18 million users.

تطبيق ختمة يساعدك على ختم القرآن الكريم حيث يقدم لك وردك اليومي حسب المدة التي تريد أن تختم المصحف فيها، كما يقوم بتنبيهك يوميا لتذكيرك بالورد في الوقت الذي تحدده.

مزايا التطبيق:
- إمكانية تحديد مدة الختمة أو كمية الورد الذي تود قراءته يوميا
- قراءة الورد من داخل التطبيق (من مصحف مدقق من مجمع الملك فهد ذو جودة عالية)
- تحديد وقت المنبه اليومي للتذكير بالورد
- أذكار الصباح والمساء وغيرها
- تصفح القرآن حسب السور أو الأجزاء
- منبه يومي للأذكار والسنن كسورة الكهف يوم الجمعة
- مواقيت الصلاة الدقيقة لجميع مدن العالم
- تنبيهات للأذان وقبل الأذان
- اتجاه القبلة
- 5 أنواع من الويدجت لعرض مواقيت الصلاة بسهولة
- إمكانية مشاركة الورد الحالي عبر شبكات التواصل

---------------------------

Khatmah App is your daily Quran reader, allowing you to finish reading the Quran in the number of days you want. Khatmah provides you with daily Quran sessions from a high-quality Mushaf, along with daily alarms to remind you of your Khatmah. Khatmah also provides you with accurate Prayer Times, Athkar, Adhan notifications, Qibla Locator, and Prayer Times widgets.

description:
Отправляйтесь в путешествие по книжному миру вместе со Строками!

- полный доступ к основному каталогу электронных и аудиокниг без ограничений по времени
- тысячи книг, аудиокниг, подкастов, комиксов, а также прессу
- бестселлеры и новинки всех жанров

Читать со Строками легко:  
- делайте новые книжные открытия с помощью умной системы рекомендаций 
- скачивайте книги в дорогу, чтобы читать и слушать без интернета 
- настраивайте читалку под себя: меняйте фон, шрифт, размер текста и скорость аудио 
- переключайтесь бесшовно между текстом и аудио книгой
- выделяйте цитаты, ставьте оценки и делитесь впечатлениями о книгах
- читайте мангу и вебтуны в оригинальной вёрстке

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Давайте знакомиться, мы — Читай-город! В нашем приложении, которое связывает интернет-магазин и более 500 книжных по всей стране, можно:

– Покупать книги, сувениры, канцелярию себе или в подарок. Можно воспользоваться услугой «Забрать за 1 час», выбрав самый удобный для вас способ получения. Или оформить экспресс-доставку — чтобы получить заветный томик скорее.

– Делать предзаказы на новинки. Многие из них есть только у нас, причём с эксклюзивными подарками!

– Получать рекомендации через сервис «Я в магазине». Выберите Читай-город, в котором находитесь, и мы покажем его новинки и топы — указав стеллаж и полку. Или введите название книги, которая интересует, чтобы узнать, где она стоит. Ещё можем посоветовать вам историю почти по любому запросу. Например, что-то о котиках ;)

– Быстро узнавать об акциях, скидках, получать и тратить бонусы.

– Выбирать книги на основе наших статей и советов от искусственного интеллекта CHIT-Ai. Он проанализирует, чем интересовались, и предложит истории специально для вас! 

– Купить электронный сертификат, который можно использовать и у нас в магазинах, и точно угадать с подарком — есть варианты в разных номиналах и дизайнах. Можем даже подсказать с пожеланием.

Программа лояльности Книголов

Книголов — единая программа лояльности Читай-города, Буквоеда, book24.ruи Литрес. С ней  вы сможете копить бонусы и оплачивать ими до 100% от стоимости покупки.

Фишки программы лояльности:

– Подарки для новых участников: 50 бонусов за регистрацию на кассе и 50 бонусов за подписку на рассылки. 

– Кешбэк до 15% за покупки. Чем больше покупаете – тем выше кешбэк. А для клиентов с Литрес Подпиской он специальный, целых 20%!

– Единый счёт: копите и тратьте бонусы на сайте, в приложении или в магазинах нашей сети, а ещё в Буквоеде, Литрес, Гоголь-Моголе и на сайте book24.ru.

– Простые условия: 1 бонус = 1 рубль. Бонусами можно оплатить до 100% от стоимости покупок.

– Секретные скидки и другие предложения для владельцев бонусной карты. 

– Бонусы в подарок: 100 в день рождения, до 30 за отзывы на сайте и не только.

Чтобы стать участником программы лояльности, зарегистрируйтесь в приложении и разрешите выпуск карты. Это займёт всего пару минут :)

Доставка

Получайте заказ любым удобным способом — курьером, Почтой России, в одном из наших магазинов или в пункте самовывоза. Доставка действует по всей стране.

– Бесплатная доставка в магазины Читай-города и партнёрской сети Буквоед.

– Более 1000 пунктов самовывоза по всей России.

– Курьерская экспресс-доставка по адресу всего за несколько часов.

– Бесплатная курьерская доставка при заказе от 2000 рублей.

– Доставка в подарок другому человеку – возможна, даже если вы не знаете адреса. Об упаковке тоже позаботимся!

В общем, у нас много фишек. А ведь это ещё не все ;) Скачивайте приложение и проверяйте сами!

You can even download books to your device, so you can enjoy a great story when you don't have mobile data or wi-fi. This works on your iPhone, iPad and even your Apple Watch. Go running with your watch and leave your phone at home or listen through CarPlay during a long car ride.

We love feedback from our customers! If you have new ideas, opinions or problems you'd like to share, reach out via e-mail at support@bookbeat.com. When you contact us, we will process your personal data, such as your name, contact details, and the content of your inquiry. The processing takes place, among other things, to be able to handle your case. Read more in our privacy policy for information about your rights.

Your Complete Spiritual Companion

Quran Kareem brings prayer, recitation, and daily remembrance into one simple, beautiful app. Get precise prayer times with Athan alerts, find Qibla instantly, read or listen to the full Holy Quran, and stay consistent with dua, azkar, and a built-in digital tasbih—online or offline.

Key Features

• Accurate Prayer Times & Athan
Automatic prayer times for all five daily prayers based on your location and preferred calculation/ madhab settings. Choose Athan sounds and gentle reminders so you never miss a prayer.

• Live Qibla Compass
Point your phone and face the right direction—anywhere. The real-time Qibla compass includes calibration help and a map view for clarity indoors and outdoors.

• Full Holy Quran (114 Surahs)
Read the complete Quran with clear Arabic text. Adjust font size, night mode, and line spacing for comfortable reading. Quickly jump to surahs, ayahs, or Juz, and add bookmarks for your place.

• High-Quality Quran Audio (Offline)
Listen to recitations from selected Qaris with continuous playback—even when the screen is off. Download surahs for offline listening to keep your khatm moving anywhere.

• Translations & Tafsir
Understand the meaning with popular translations (English and other languages). Toggle word-by-word or verse-by-verse views. Optional tafsir provides deeper context.

• Dhikr & Tasbih Counter
A smart digital tasbih you can customize for your daily adhkar. Haptic tick, progress goals, and history help you build consistent habits.

• Daily Dua & Azkar
Morning and evening azkar collections with reminders you control. Save your favorites and track what you’ve completed.

• 99 Names of Allah
Learn and reflect on Asma’ul Husna with meanings and benefits—study mode or gentle daily prompts.

• Ramadan-Ready
Suhur/Iftar times, pre-prayer reminders, and auto-download for your most-played surahs to make Ramadan smooth and focused.

Designed for Ease & Focus
Clean design, readable typography, and fast navigation keep your attention on worship. Works offline for reading, listening, and dhikr when you’re on the go.

Privacy & Respect
No clutter, no distractions—just reliable tools to support your spiritual routine.

---------------------

• Privacy policy: https://sites.google.com/view/pp-of-quran-kareem/home

Somali Quran recitation, known as Qur'an Xafidah, incorporates unique intonations, rhythms, and pauses. This style reflects the cultural and linguistic influences of the Somali language on the recitation of the Quran.

Explore our iOS Quran app, designed for easy access to the Holy Quran on Apple devices. Our Somali Quran application is designed in an English format, making it accessible and user-friendly for individuals who are not familiar with the Arabic language. The Holy Quran consists of 30 Juz (parts) and 114 Suras (chapters).

The Quran in Somali Language has been predominantly oral, passed down through generations of Quran teachers (known as "Ustaads") to their students. This oral tradition has preserved not only the words of the Quran but also the specific intonations and melodies associated with Somali Quran recitation.

The Somali language's phonetic and tonal characteristics influence the way verses of Quran are recited. While Somali translation recitation has its own unique style, it adheres to the principles of Tajweed.

Reciting the sacred books of the Muslims is a duty that all Muslims should attempt to fulfill. It allows devout followers within the religion to gain inner peace, rewards, and approval from Allah.

Studying Tafsir enables you to grasp the Quran’s messages and deeper meanings. Understanding the words of our creator brings us nearer to Him, as expressed in the Quranic verse.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
DAILY VERSES

● After setting the reminder, you’ll get daily notifications to read your daily Quran verses.
QURAN VIDEOS
● Here you can find many Quran videos available.
 
WALLPAPERS
● A wide variety of beautiful wallpapers are available.
QUOTES

● We have Quran quotes in the form of images and text.
 
MY LIBRARY
● My library has all the highlighted verses, notes, and bookmarks that you make.
 
CALENDAR
● Contains all the festival dates.
 
VERSE GRAPHICS
● Quranic verses with images are available; select and share them with friends and family on social media.

تطبيق "نحويّ" هو تطبيق يقدم محتوى متخصص في قواعد اللغة العربية. إليك شرح مختصر لمميزات هذا التطبيق:

    واجهة سهلة الاستخدام:
        يتميز التطبيق بواجهة مستخدم بسيطة وسهلة الاستخدام، مما يسهل على المستخدمين تصفح واستخدام محتوى الكتب بشكل فعال.

    إضافة شارات مرجعية والرجوع اليها في أي وقت آخر:
        يوفر التطبيق إمكانية إضافة شارات مرجعية للصفحات المهمة والعودة إليها لاحقًا، مما يسهل على المستخدمين استئناف قراءتهم والرجوع إلى المعلومات الرئيسية.

    الاستماع لمحتوى بعض الكتب:
        يقدم التطبيق خاصية الاستماع لمحتوى بعض الكتب، مما يتيح للمستخدمين تجربة الاستماع إلى النصوص بدلاً من قراءتها.

    نسخ المحتوى:
        يتيح التطبيق للمستخدمين نسخ محتوى الكتب بسهولة، مما يسهل عمليات النسخ واللصق للرجوع إلى المعلومات فيما بعد.

    مشاركة المحتوى كنص أو كصورة:
        يوفر التطبيق خاصية مشاركة المحتوى بشكل نصي أو كصورة، مما يتيح للمستخدمين مشاركة المعلومات مع الآخرين بطرق متعددة.

Привет!

С вами Буквоед, Знаковые книжные. Почему Знаковые? Уже больше 20 лет Буквоед делает чтение доступнее: помогает ориентироваться в мире литературы, знакомит с авторами, играет важную роль в культурной жизни Петербурга.

А это мобильное приложение, где книголюбы могут найти:

• Тысячи историй, сувениров, канцтоваров и подарков. Быстро и бесплатно привезём ваш заказ в магазины Буквоеда и Читай-города, а ещё доставим курьером, Почтой России, в постаматы и ПВЗ.

• Программу лояльности Книголов для Знаковых Читателей: она действует в Буквоеде, Читай-городе, book24.ru и Литрес. Возвращайте до 15% от заказа бонусами, которыми можно оплатить до 100% с покупок.

• Рекомендации, чтобы не заблудиться в книжном многообразии. Например, литературные подборки, а ещё сервис «Я в магазине». Он подскажет, где стоит интересующий вас сюжет и предложит истории по запросу. 

• Подарочные сертификаты — их можно обменять на любые истории, сувениры, настольные игры и даже сладости. 

• Информацию о действующих скидках, предложениях от издательств и других акциях.

Нам есть куда ещё стремиться – пока обзоры новинок и расписание встреч с авторами доступны только на сайте bookvoed.ru. Но разделы будут постепенно появляться и здесь со следующими обновлениями.

Будем рады вашим отзывам и предложениям о том, что нужно изменить и добавить в первую очередь: customer@bookvoed.ru. 

До встречи в Знаковых книжных!
